subtitle: These potato pancakes are a traditional Jewish dish for Hannukah.

method.text: Grate the potato finely. Place in a sieve. Leave to drain for 10 min.
Put the potato into a bowl. Mix in remaining ingredients.
Heat 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> cm of oil in a heavy frying pan. Add tablespoons of the mixture and flatten with the back of the spoon.
Cook for 4 min on each side or until golden brown. Drain on crumpled kitchen paper before serving.
